Class MOS 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----MOS
public class MOS
extends Object

MOS()
Default Constructor

addToMemQ(PCB)
Adds a process to the memory queue to be granted additional memory.
handleIOI()
Handles any interrupts that have been generated by Channel 1, 2, or 3
handleMemQ()
Handles the memory queue, current implementation only allocates memory needed.
handlePI()
Takes care of any Program Interrupts that occured during slave mode
handleSI()
Handles any Supervisor Interrupts that were set during slave mode.
handleTI()
Handles any interrupts that have been generated by the program time
incClocks()
Increments all the clocks on the channels like magic.
main(String[])
Main Method
tick()
Runs the OS, one clock cycle Slave Mode.

MOS 
 public MOS()
Default Constructor

tick 
 public void tick()
Runs the OS, one clock cycle Slave Mode. Invoked only if there is a process int the ReadyQ Simulation Mode. generates TI and IOI Master Mode calculated each clock cycle Interrupts are handled and loads a process into the current PCB if one does not already exist and there is one available in the ready queue.

incClocks 
 public void incClocks()
Increments all the clocks on the channels like magic.

handleSI 
 public void handleSI()
Handles any Supervisor Interrupts that were set during slave mode.

handlePI 
 public void handlePI()
Takes care of any Program Interrupts that occured during slave mode

handleIOI 
 public void handleIOI()
Handles any interrupts that have been generated by Channel 1, 2, or 3

handleTI 
 public void handleTI()
Handles any interrupts that have been generated by the program time

addToMemQ 
 public void addToMemQ(PCB addPCB)
Adds a process to the memory queue to be granted additional memory. Request is allowed one page at a time, therefore priority is FIFO

Parameters:
addPCB - is a reference to the PCB that will be added to the memory wait queue
handleMemQ 
 public void handleMemQ()
Handles the memory queue, current implementation only allocates memory needed. Anotherwords we are screwed if there is not enough main memory to swap somethin in. Process only comes here if it did an SR or GD instruction on a piece of memory which hasn't been allocated. No parameters

main 
 public static void main(String arg[])
Main Method
